Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a red pottery wine-jar, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with remains of one lines of black-painted hieratic text, now faded, specifying the contents as wine.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389863) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389863)
